plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/modal\/sync.Attention, cette fonctionnalité va copie: Please note that this feature will copy all the commands from this Broadlink to the other Broadlinks. This destroys existing commands with the same name on the targets

plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/modal\/sync.Veuillez choisir vers quelle(s) cible(s): Please choose to which target (s) you want to synchronize the commands of this Broadlink:

plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/php\/broadl.Vous êtes en mode inclusion. Recliquez s: You are in inclusion mode. Click again on the include button to exit this mode
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/php\/broadl.Aucun équipement Template trouvé, clique: No Template equipment found, click "Add" to start
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/php\/broadl.Adresse MAC inversée par paquet de deux: Reverse MAC address in packets of two without the colons and in lowercase (AA:BB:CC:DD:EE becomes eeddccbbaa)
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/php\/broadl.Délai de rafraichissement des commandes: Refresh time for information commands in seconds
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/php\/broadl.Ne jamais cocher sur l'équipement princi: Never tick on the main equipment only in case of duplication of a Broadlink RM to separate the commands (the MAC address must then end with

plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/js\/broadli.Un périphérique vient d'être inclus ou e: A device has just been included or excluded. Please refresh the page
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/js\/broadli.Une nouvelle commande vient d'être ajout: A new command has just been added, remember to name it
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/js\/broadli.Radio-fréquence trouvée, vous pouvez lâc: Radio frequency found, you can let go of the button and get ready to press in 3 seconds
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/js\/broadli.Veuillez appuyer sur le bouton de votre: Please press the button on your remote control
plugins\/broadlink\/desktop\/js\/broadli.Veuillez maintenir appuyé le bouton de v: Please hold down the button on your remote control (or press it successively) to find the radio frequency
